scope.description: Describes if this file targets a server, framework or control file when it is copied inside the hmi project.

source.description: Identifies the localization file source for project level override. Required in engineering environment if file is used to override localization files with Control or Function scope. Example: 'TcHmi.Controls.System.TcHmiControl'

order.description: Load order of language files. If multiple files of the same language are available the one with the lowest order will be used for conflicting variables.

locale.description: Language and Region (optionally) as described in ISO 639/BCP 47 (Examples: 'en', 'en-US').

localizedText.description: Name of each additionalProperties entry is the name of each text variable.

additionalProperties.description: Localized text. It may contain placeholders like {0}, {1}, ... May be null if current locale does not have a text.

anyOf.description: Localized text. It may contain placeholders like {0}, {1}, ...
Localized key which has no text value in this locale.
